summary.span: 给定表示数据协定的类和表示此协定的某个成员的元数据时，会为该成员生成 Xpath 查询。

span.span: When given a class representing a data contract, and metadata representing a member of the contract, produces an XPath query for the member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关数据协定的详细信息，请参阅[使用数据协定](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md)。For more information about data contracts, see [Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md). 要使用此类，请按以下四个步骤操作：To use the class, there are four steps: 1. 通过将适当的 和 应用到此类型及其字段或属性，来创建数据协定类型。Create the data contract type by applying the and as appropriate to the type and its fields or properties. 2. 使用 类的 方法生成 MemberInfo 数组。Use the method of the class to generate the MemberInfo array. 3. 将此类型和数组传递到该方法。Pass the type and the array to the method. 4. 如果需要，请使用 参数返回的 `namespaces` 来检查 XPath 查询中命名空间前缀引用的 XML 命名空间。If needed, use the returned by the `namespaces` parameter to examine the XML namespaces referenced by the namespaces prefixes in the XPath query. > [!NOTE] > 将命名空间前缀 "xg"（表示 "XPath Generator"）用作 Xpath 中的默认命名空间前缀。The namespace prefix "xg" (for "XPath Generator") is used as the default in the XPath. 无法更改此前缀。This cannot be changed. 但可以参考 NameTable 集合来了解此前缀与什么命名空间关联。Instead, refer to the NameTable collection to see what namespace the prefix is associated with. ## Examples 下面的示例通过应用了 和 特性的两个类创建 XPath 查询。The following example creates XPath queries from two classes to which the and attributes have been applied.
